gestion_horarios.encabezado: Module for the Availability of quotas
gestion_horarios.label: Availability of places
gestion_horarios.mensaje_inicial: Please select the curricular project, the academic period and the semester that is to consult the availability of places by academic space
gestion_horarios.mensaje_tabla: The table exposes the allocation of quotas for the different academic spaces for the information entered, you can edit the quotas or enable or disable the quotas
gestion_horarios.mensaje_inicial_2: Please select the search criteria you wish to carry out, select the academic period, academic project, academic space and group to consult, the more criteria you select, the more specific the query will be
gestion_horarios.mensaje_gestion: User in this component you must select the action of interest to perform in the module
gestion_horarios.mensaje_calendario: User, keep in mind that you can only manage schedules within the dates established here
gestion_horarios.mensaje_suite: User, please select the option you want to perform
gestion_horarios.mensaje_inicial_3: User, in this module you can create the courses that are of interest to you.
gestion_horarios.mensaje_inicial_4: User in this module you will be able to manage schedules for your related curricular projects.
gestion_horarios.placeholder_grupo: Select the group for which the time allocation applies
gestion_horarios.mensaje_inicial_5: Next you must select and enter the Specific information required.
gestion_horarios.select_facultad: Select the Faculty from the list
gestion_horarios.select_bloque: Select the Block from the list
gestion_horarios.select_salon: Select the room from the list
gestion_horarios.mensaje_inicial_6: Next you must graphically locate the academic space of interest.
gestion_horarios.mensaje_inicial_7: User, the assignment of academic load is optional as long as it is within the dates established in the general calendar
gestion_horarios.mensaje_copiar_horario: Next you must select and enter the Transverse information required to make the copy of interest.
gestion_horarios.mensaje_listar_horarios: Next you must select the information to search for schedules, keep in mind that some of the following options are optional, but at the same time you will they will help to be much more specific in the search.
gestion_horarios.select_grupo: Seleccione el grupo para el cual aplica la asignación horaría
gestion_horarios.mensaje_visualizar_matriz: User, please note that to view the matrix, you will need to select a specific GROUP
gestion_horarios.no_planes_de_proyecto: There are no study plans assigned to the selected curricular project
gestion_horarios.descripcion_gestion_horarios: Create the courses that interest you.
gestion_horarios.descripcion_registrar_horario: Manage the schedules for your related curricular projects.
gestion_horarios.descripcion_copiar_horario: Copy schedules for your related curricular projects.
gestion_horarios.descripcion_reporte_horarios: Download reports from the schedule management module.
gestion_horarios.no_semestres_para_plan_estudio: There are no semesters registered for the study plan.
gestion_horarios.no_proyectos_para_subnivel: There are no curricular projects assigned to the selected sublevel.
gestion_horarios.descripcion_crear_grupo: Form to create a new group of people.
gestion_horarios.no_grupos_para_espacio: No groups are registered for the selected academic space
gestion_horarios.descripcion_editar_grupo: Form to edit the selected group of people
gestion_horarios.error_crear_grupo_personas: Error creating the group of people
gestion_horarios.esta_seguro_crear_grupo_personas: Are you sure you want to create the group of people?
gestion_horarios.esta_seguro_eliminar_grupo_personas: Are you sure you want to delete the group of people?
gestion_horarios.esta_seguro_editar_grupo_personas: Are you sure you want to edit the group of people?
gestion_horarios.error_editar_grupo_personas: Error editing the group of people
gestion_horarios.digite_horas: Enter the number of hours for this day
gestion_horarios.descripcion_detalle_espacio: Complete detail of the selected academic space
gestion_horarios.mensaje_horario: Drag the spaces to the desired schedule. To see more details or assign a teacher, click on the name of the corresponding space.
gestion_horarios.descripcion_asignar_docente: Assignment of a teacher to the selected academic space
gestion_horarios.semestre_para_cargar_grupos: Select the academic semester to view the study groups
gestion_horarios.desea_crear_horario: Do you want to create a new schedule?
gestion_horarios.desea_crear_horario_descripcion: No schedule was found registered for the period
gestion_horarios.desea_crear_horario_semestre: Do you want to create a new schedule for the selected semester?
gestion_horarios.desea_crear_horario_semestre_descripcion: No schedule was found registered for the selected semester
gestion_horarios.grupo_ya_seleccionado: The group has already been selected
gestion_horarios.no_grupos_registrados: There are no registered study groups, you can create them in Group Management.
gestion_horarios.docente_sin_plan_trabajo: The consulted teacher does not have an assigned work plan.
gestion_horarios.plan_docente_sin_construccion: The teacher's work plan is not under construction.

ptd.ask_borrar: Are you sure to delete this assignment?
ptd.ask_mover: Are you sure to set the assignment on the
ptd.formato_control_cumplimiento_norma: Compliance control form with current regulations
ptd.ask_cumple_normatividad: Does Consolidated comply with the regulations?
ptd.select_enviar_aprov_dec: Send for approval by the Deanship
ptd.copiar_plan_ver_coordinador_p1: You have requested to copy the work plan for the period
ptd.copiar_plan_ver_coordinador_p2: The academic load and its related information will be copied
ptd.aviso_informativo_docente_p1: Take into account that you must keep in mind the dates stipulated in the academic calendar
ptd.aviso_informativo_docente_p2: Keep in mind that in accordance with the provisions of article 50 of agreement 011/2022, the teachers of the career must agree with their coordinator of the curricular project and at least one (1) month in advance at the beginning of the academic period the work plan
ptd.copiar_plan_ver_docente_p2: * Do not intersect with those that have already been registered (activities registered in the current period will not be overwritten)
ptd.copiar_plan_ver_docente_p3: * Do not cross the registered academic load
ptd.copiar_plan_ver_docente_p4: * Correspond to an available physical space
ptd.placeholder_nombre_docente: You must enter at least 3 characters in the field to search for the teacher.
ptd.error_tipo_vinculacion: Please indicate the type of relationship of the teacher.
ptd.error_docente: Please enter the name and select the teacher.
ptd.error_doc_docente: Please indicate the document number of the teacher.
ptd.error_no_found_docente: No teachers found with the document entered.
ptd.error_no_found_espacio_academico: No academic course were found with the code entered.
ptd.error_no_found_proyectos: The selected academic course has no projects or groups assigned.
ptd.error_no_found_preasignaciones: No pre-assignment were found for the selected period.
ptd.error_no_found_asignaciones: No assignments found for the selected period
ptd.error_codigo: Please enter the academic course code.
ptd.error_update_assign_period_spaces: The period could not be assigned to the selected groups
ptd.seleccion_periodo: Please select the period to load the data
ptd.guardado_ptd_exito: The teacher work plan assignment has been saved for the linkage
ptd.mensaje_copiar_plan: When copying the Teacher Work Plan, what has been assigned up to now will be discarded and replaced by the copy. However, the changes do not take effect until you save the changes.
ptd.mensaje_espacio_sin_periodo: The consulted academic space does not have the assigned period, please select the groups that you want to assign the academic period for the teaching pre-assignment.
ptd.espacios_no_requeridos: In the previous Teacher Work Plan, were found academic spaces that are no longer required or loaded for the current plan, these are:
ptd.espacios_sin_asignar: In the previous Teacher Work plan some spaces were not assigned, please define the missing study load for the following academic spaces:
ptd.no_info_copia_carga_lectiva: No study load for the selected period, or incomplete information
ptd.no_info_copia_actividades: No activities for the selected period, or incomplete information
ptd.pregunta_enviar_a_docente: Send for Teacher Approval? This action means that it has been approved by the Curricular Project
ptd.pregunta_enviar_a_coordinacion: Send approval to coordination? The approved academic spaces will be part of your Teacher Work Plan
ptd.pregunta_editar: Editing the preassignment requires the approval process again, Continue?
ptd.pregunta_enviar: When you send you will not be able to continue editing, continue?
ptd.info_modo_solo_ver: In this state it is not possible to edit the plan
ptd.recordar_aprobar_plan: Don't forget to pre-approve or reject the plan in the final section of this page
ptd.revisar_solapamiento_carga: Please check that there is no overlap between study load and activities. Check that the summary of the total hours coincides with what is charged in the schedule.
ptd.no_planes_particulares: No plans found for the selected period or curricular project
ptd.proyecto_sin_espacios: The Curricular Project related to the selected subject does not have defined physical spaces
ptd.generador_consolidado_info: This tool generates the consolidated automatically, but it is recommended to review and adjust if necessary.
ptd.select_periodo_proyecto: You must select the period and the academic project to save the consolidated
ptd.please_descargue_consolidado: Please generate the document to relate the teacher work plans to the present consolidated
ptd.info_firma_digital: This Teacher Work Plan will be approved and therefore digitally signed
ptd.info_agrerar_representante: If you are not the coordinator, please add yourself as a representative
ptd.info_revisar_cargar_formato: Please download, review and re-upload the "Compliance control form with current regulations"
ptd.no_valid_pre_asignacion: The academic space already has pre-assignment for the current period.
ptd.info_cambio_documento_consolidado: It's important to note that making changes to the Consolidated document's content will require restarting the approval process (changing its status to 'Not approved') and, if necessary, updating the Teacher Work Plans.
ptd.pdf_solover_excel_imprimir: Pdf document not suitable for printing or editing, please save the excel version provided.
ptd.tiempo_inferior_periodo: Loading with time less than the period
ptd.no_docente_encontrado: No teacher found with the provided document
ptd.no_vinculacion_docente: No affiliations found for the provided teacher
ptd.descripcion_asignar_docente: Please enter the document in the corresponding field and press Enter to fill in the remaining fields.
